lessons.sentence: Hello!

translations.de: Hallo!
translations.en: Hello!
translations.ja: こんにちは！
translations.th: สวัสดี!
translations.vi: Xin chào!

lessons.sentence: Thank you.

translations.de: Danke.
translations.en: Thank you.
translations.ja: ありがとうございます。
translations.th: ขอบคุณ
translations.vi: Cảm ơn.

lessons.sentence: Nice to meet you.

translations.de: Freut mich, Sie kennenzulernen.
translations.en: Nice to meet you.
translations.ja: はじめまして。
translations.th: ยินดีที่ได้รู้จัก
translations.vi: Rất vui được gặp bạn.

lessons.sentence: How are you?

translations.de: Wie geht es Ihnen?
translations.en: How are you?
translations.ja: お元気ですか？
translations.th: คุณเป็นอย่างไรบ้าง?
translations.vi: Bạn khỏe không?

lessons.sentence: I'm fine, thank you.

translations.de: Mir geht es gut, danke.
translations.en: I'm fine, thank you.
translations.ja: 元気です、ありがとうございます。
translations.th: ฉันสบายดี ขอบคุณ
translations.vi: Tôi khỏe, cảm ơn.

lessons.sentence: What's your name?

translations.de: Wie heißen Sie?
translations.en: What's your name?
translations.ja: お名前は何ですか？
translations.th: คุณชื่ออะไร?
translations.vi: Bạn tên là gì?

lessons.sentence: My name is John.

translations.de: Mein Name ist John.
translations.en: My name is John.
translations.ja: 私の名前はジョンです。
translations.th: ผมชื่อจอห์น
translations.vi: Tên tôi là John.

lessons.sentence: Nice to meet you too.

translations.de: Freut mich auch.
translations.en: Nice to meet you too.
translations.hi: मुझे भी आपसे मिलकर खुशी हुई।
translations.ja: こちらこそ、よろしくお願いします。
translations.th: ยินดีที่ได้รู้จักเช่นกัน
translations.vi: Tôi cũng rất vui được gặp bạn.

lessons.sentence: See you later.

translations.de: Bis später.
translations.en: See you later.
translations.ja: また後で。
translations.th: แล้วเจอกัน
translations.vi: Hẹn gặp lại.

lessons.sentence: Have a nice day!

translations.de: Einen schönen Tag noch!
translations.en: Have a nice day!
translations.ja: 良い一日を！
translations.th: ขอให้เป็นวันที่ดี!
translations.vi: Chúc bạn một ngày tốt lành!

lessons.sentence: Excuse me.

translations.de: Entschuldigung.
translations.en: Excuse me.
translations.ja: すみません。
translations.th: ขอโทษครับ/ค่ะ
translations.vi: Xin lỗi.

lessons.sentence: I'm sorry.

translations.de: Es tut mir leid.
translations.en: I'm sorry.
translations.ja: 申し訳ありません。
translations.th: ผม/ฉันขอโทษ
translations.vi: Tôi xin lỗi.

lessons.sentence: No problem.

translations.de: Kein Problem.
translations.en: No problem.
translations.ja: 大丈夫です。
translations.th: ไม่เป็นไร
translations.vi: Không sao.

lessons.sentence: What time is it?

translations.de: Wie spät ist es?
translations.en: What time is it?
translations.ja: 今何時ですか？
translations.th: ตอนนี้กี่โมง?
translations.vi: Mấy giờ rồi?

lessons.sentence: Where is the restroom?

translations.de: Wo ist die Toilette?
translations.en: Where is the restroom?
translations.ja: トイレはどこですか？
translations.th: ห้องน้ำอยู่ที่ไหน?
translations.vi: Nhà vệ sinh ở đâu?

lessons.sentence: Can you help me?

translations.de: Können Sie mir helfen?
translations.en: Can you help me?
translations.hi: क्या आप मेरी मदद कर सकते हैं?
translations.ja: 手伝っていただけますか？
translations.th: คุณช่วยฉันได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể giúp tôi không?

lessons.sentence: I don't understand.

translations.de: Ich verstehe nicht.
translations.en: I don't understand.
translations.ja: わかりません。
translations.th: ฉันไม่เข้าใจ
translations.vi: Tôi không hiểu.

lessons.sentence: Could you repeat that?

translations.de: Könnten Sie das wiederholen?
translations.en: Could you repeat that?
translations.ja: もう一度言っていただけますか？
translations.th: คุณช่วยพูดอีกครั้งได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể nhắc lại không?

lessons.sentence: Could you speak more slowly?

translations.de: Könnten Sie langsamer sprechen?
translations.en: Could you speak more slowly?
translations.hi: क्या आप धीरे बोल सकते हैं?
translations.ja: もう少しゆっくり話していただけますか？
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы говорить медленнее?
translations.th: คุณช่วยพูดช้าลงได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể nói chậm hơn không?

lessons.sentence: What does this mean?

translations.de: Was bedeutet das?
translations.en: What does this mean?
translations.ja: これはどういう意味ですか？
translations.th: นี่หมายความว่าอะไร?
translations.vi: Điều này có nghĩa là gì?

lessons.sentence: How much is this?

translations.de: Wie viel kostet das?
translations.en: How much is this?
translations.ja: これはいくらですか？
translations.th: อันนี้เท่าไหร่?
translations.vi: Cái này bao nhiêu tiền?

lessons.sentence: Can I try this on?

translations.de: Kann ich das anprobieren?
translations.en: Can I try this on?
translations.hi: क्या मैं इसे पहनकर देख सकता हूँ?
translations.ja: 試着してもいいですか？
translations.th: ฉันลองได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Tôi có thể thử cái này không?

lessons.sentence: I'll take this one.

translations.de: Ich nehme das hier.
translations.en: I'll take this one.
translations.ja: これにします。
translations.th: ฉันจะเอาอันนี้
translations.vi: Tôi sẽ lấy cái này.

lessons.sentence: Do you have this in a different size?

translations.de: Haben Sie das in einer anderen Größe?
translations.en: Do you have this in a different size?
translations.hi: क्या यह दूसरे साइज़ में है?
translations.ja: 別のサイズはありますか？
translations.th: มีไซส์อื่นไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có size khác không?

lessons.sentence: Can I pay by card?

translations.de: Kann ich mit Karte bezahlen?
translations.en: Can I pay by card?
translations.hi: क्या मैं कार्ड से भुगतान कर सकता हूँ?
translations.ja: カードで支払えますか？
translations.th: จ่ายบัตรได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Tôi có thể thanh toán bằng thẻ không?

lessons.sentence: I'd like to return this.

translations.de: Ich möchte das zurückgeben.
translations.en: I'd like to return this.
translations.hi: मैं इसे वापस करना चाहता हूँ।
translations.ja: これを返品したいのですが。
translations.th: ฉันอยากคืนสินค้านี้
translations.vi: Tôi muốn trả lại cái này.

lessons.sentence: Could I have the check, please?

translations.de: Die Rechnung, bitte.
translations.en: Could I have the check, please?
translations.ja: お会計お願いします。
translations.th: ขอบิลด้วยครับ/ค่ะ
translations.vi: Cho tôi hóa đơn.

lessons.sentence: I have a reservation.

translations.de: Ich habe eine Reservierung.
translations.en: I have a reservation.
translations.ja: 予約しています。
translations.th: ฉันจองไว้แล้ว
translations.vi: Tôi có đặt chỗ.

lessons.sentence: Where is the nearest subway station?

translations.de: Wo ist die nächste U-Bahn-Station?
translations.en: Where is the nearest subway station?
translations.es: ¿Dónde está la estación de metro más cercana?
translations.fr: Où est la station de métro la plus proche ?
translations.it: Dov'è la stazione della metro più vicina?
translations.ja: 一番近い地下鉄の駅はどこですか？
translations.pt: Onde fica a estação de metrô mais próxima?
translations.th: สถานีรถไฟใต้ดินที่ใกล้ที่สุดอยู่ที่ไหน?
translations.vi: Ga tàu điện ngầm gần nhất ở đâu?

lessons.sentence: How do I get to the airport?

translations.de: Wie komme ich zum Flughafen?
translations.en: How do I get to the airport?
translations.ja: 空港へはどうやって行けばいいですか？
translations.th: ไปสนามบินยังไง?
translations.vi: Làm sao để đến sân bay?

lessons.sentence: Is this seat taken?

translations.de: Ist dieser Platz frei?
translations.en: Is this seat taken?
translations.ja: この席は空いていますか？
translations.th: ที่นั่งนี้ว่างไหม?
translations.vi: Chỗ này có ai ngồi không?

lessons.sentence: Can I have a menu, please?

translations.de: Kann ich bitte die Speisekarte haben?
translations.en: Can I have a menu, please?
translations.fr: Puis-je avoir le menu, s'il vous plaît ?
translations.it: Posso avere il menù, per favore?
translations.ja: メニューをいただけますか？
translations.pt: Posso ver o cardápio, por favor?
translations.th: ขอเมนูด้วยครับ/ค่ะ
translations.vi: Cho tôi xem thực đơn.

lessons.sentence: I'd like to order.

translations.de: Ich möchte bestellen.
translations.en: I'd like to order.
translations.ja: 注文したいのですが。
translations.th: ฉันอยากสั่งอาหาร
translations.vi: Tôi muốn gọi món.

lessons.sentence: Could I have some water, please?

translations.de: Könnte ich etwas Wasser haben, bitte?
translations.en: Could I have some water, please?
translations.fr: Puis-je avoir de l'eau, s'il vous plaît ?
translations.ja: お水をいただけますか？
translations.pt: Poderia me dar água, por favor?
translations.th: ขอน้ำด้วยครับ/ค่ะ
translations.vi: Cho tôi xin nước.

lessons.sentence: Nice to meet you. I'm the new employee.

translations.de: Freut mich. Ich bin der neue Mitarbeiter.
translations.en: Nice to meet you. I'm the new employee.
translations.fr: Enchanté. Je suis le nouveau employé.
translations.hi: आपसे मिलकर खुशी हुई। मैं नया कर्मचारी हूँ।
translations.ja: はじめまして。新入社員です。
translations.th: ยินดีที่ได้รู้จัก ผมเป็นพนักงานใหม่
translations.vi: Rất vui được gặp. Tôi là nhân viên mới.
translations.zh-CN: 很高兴认识你。我是新员工。
translations.zh-TW: 很高興認識你。我是新員工。

lessons.sentence: I have a meeting at 10.

translations.de: Ich habe um 10 Uhr ein Meeting.
translations.en: I have a meeting at 10.
translations.ja: 10時に会議があります。
translations.th: ฉันมีประชุมตอน 10 โมง
translations.vi: Tôi có cuộc họp lúc 10 giờ.

lessons.sentence: Could you send me the file?

translations.de: Könnten Sie mir die Datei schicken?
translations.en: Could you send me the file?
translations.hi: क्या आप मुझे फ़ाइल भेज सकते हैं?
translations.ja: ファイルを送っていただけますか？
translations.pt: Você poderia me enviar o arquivo?
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы отправить мне файл?
translations.th: คุณช่วยส่งไฟล์ให้ฉันได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể gửi file cho tôi không?

lessons.sentence: I'll get back to you soon.

translations.de: Ich melde mich bald bei Ihnen.
translations.en: I'll get back to you soon.
translations.ja: すぐにご連絡します。
translations.th: ฉันจะติดต่อกลับเร็วๆ นี้
translations.vi: Tôi sẽ liên hệ lại sớm.

lessons.sentence: Let me check my schedule.

translations.de: Lassen Sie mich meinen Terminplan überprüfen.
translations.en: Let me check my schedule.
translations.fr: Laissez-moi vérifier mon emploi du temps.
translations.it: Mi faccia controllare la mia agenda.
translations.ja: スケジュールを確認させてください。
translations.th: ให้ฉันเช็คตารางก่อน
translations.vi: Để tôi kiểm tra lịch.

lessons.sentence: Thank you for your time.

translations.de: Vielen Dank für Ihre Zeit.
translations.en: Thank you for your time.
translations.ja: お時間をいただきありがとうございます。
translations.th: ขอบคุณสำหรับเวลาของคุณ
translations.vi: Cảm ơn bạn đã dành thời gian.

lessons.sentence: It's been a while since we last met.

translations.ar: مضى وقت طويل منذ آخر لقاء.
translations.de: Es ist lange her, seit wir uns zuletzt gesehen haben.
translations.en: It's been a while since we last met.
translations.es: Ha pasado tiempo desde que nos vimos.
translations.fr: Cela fait longtemps qu'on ne s'est pas vus.
translations.hi: काफी समय हो गया मिले हुए।
translations.it: È passato un po' di tempo dall'ultima volta.
translations.ja: お久しぶりです。
translations.pt: Faz tempo que não nos vemos.
translations.th: ไม่ได้เจอกันนาน
translations.vi: Lâu rồi không gặp.

lessons.sentence: Please give my regards to your family.

translations.de: Grüßen Sie Ihre Familie von mir.
translations.en: Please give my regards to your family.
translations.es: Dale mis saludos a tu familia.
translations.fr: Transmettez mes salutations à votre famille.
translations.hi: अपने परिवार को मेरा नमस्कार कहिएगा।
translations.it: Porti i miei saluti alla sua famiglia.
translations.ja: ご家族によろしくお伝えください。
translations.th: ฝากสวัสดีครอบครัวด้วยนะ
translations.vi: Cho tôi gửi lời thăm đến gia đình bạn.
translations.zh-CN: 请代我向你的家人问好。
translations.zh-TW: 請代我向你的家人問好。

lessons.sentence: I'm looking forward to seeing you again.

translations.de: Ich freue mich darauf, Sie wiederzusehen.
translations.en: I'm looking forward to seeing you again.
translations.hi: आपसे फिर मिलने की उम्मीद है।
translations.ja: またお会いできるのを楽しみにしています。
translations.th: หวังว่าจะได้พบกันอีก
translations.vi: Tôi mong được gặp lại bạn.

lessons.sentence: Take care of yourself.

translations.de: Pass auf dich auf.
translations.en: Take care of yourself.
translations.ja: お体に気をつけてください。
translations.th: ดูแลตัวเองด้วยนะ
translations.vi: Giữ gìn sức khỏe nhé.

lessons.sentence: I really appreciate your kindness.

translations.de: Ich schätze Ihre Freundlichkeit sehr.
translations.en: I really appreciate your kindness.
translations.hi: आपकी दयालुता की सराहना करता हूँ।
translations.ja: ご親切に心から感謝します。
translations.th: ขอบคุณสำหรับความใจดีของคุณ
translations.vi: Tôi thực sự cảm kích sự tử tế của bạn.

lessons.sentence: Would you mind if I asked you a question?

translations.de: Würde es Ihnen etwas ausmachen, wenn ich Ihnen eine Frage stelle?
translations.en: Would you mind if I asked you a question?
translations.es: ¿Le importaría si le hago una pregunta?
translations.fr: Cela vous dérangerait-il si je vous posais une question ?
translations.hi: क्या मैं आपसे एक सवाल पूछ सकता हूँ?
translations.it: Le dispiacerebbe se le facessi una domanda?
translations.ja: 質問してもよろしいでしょうか？
translations.pt: Você se importaria se eu fizesse uma pergunta?
translations.ru: Вы не против, если я задам вам вопрос?
translations.th: ขอถามคำถามหนึ่งได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có phiền nếu tôi hỏi một câu không?
translations.zh-CN: 我可以问你一个问题吗？
translations.zh-TW: 我可以問你一個問題嗎？

lessons.sentence: I didn't catch your name.

translations.de: Ich habe Ihren Namen nicht verstanden.
translations.en: I didn't catch your name.
translations.fr: Je n'ai pas entendu votre nom.
translations.it: Non ho sentito il suo nome.
translations.ja: お名前を聞き取れませんでした。
translations.th: ผมไม่ได้ยินชื่อคุณ
translations.vi: Tôi không nghe rõ tên bạn.

lessons.sentence: Congratulations on your promotion!

translations.de: Herzlichen Glückwunsch zur Beförderung!
translations.en: Congratulations on your promotion!
translations.ja: 昇進おめでとうございます！
translations.th: ยินดีกับการเลื่อนตำแหน่ง!
translations.vi: Chúc mừng thăng chức!

lessons.sentence: I need to make a phone call.

translations.de: Ich muss telefonieren.
translations.en: I need to make a phone call.
translations.ja: 電話をかける必要があります。
translations.th: ฉันต้องโทรศัพท์
translations.vi: Tôi cần gọi điện.

lessons.sentence: The weather is really nice today.

translations.de: Das Wetter ist heute wirklich schön.
translations.en: The weather is really nice today.
translations.es: El clima está muy agradable hoy.
translations.it: Oggi il tempo è davvero bello.
translations.ja: 今日は本当にいい天気ですね。
translations.pt: O tempo está muito bom hoje.
translations.th: วันนี้อากาศดีมาก
translations.vi: Hôm nay thời tiết thật đẹp.

lessons.sentence: I'm running a bit late.

translations.de: Ich bin etwas spät dran.
translations.en: I'm running a bit late.
translations.fr: Je suis un peu en retard.
translations.hi: मुझे थोड़ी देर हो रही है।
translations.ja: 少し遅れそうです。
translations.th: ฉันจะสายนิดหน่อย
translations.vi: Tôi đang hơi trễ.

lessons.sentence: I'm not feeling well today.

translations.de: Mir geht es heute nicht gut.
translations.en: I'm not feeling well today.
translations.fr: Je ne me sens pas bien aujourd'hui.
translations.ja: 今日は体調が良くありません。
translations.pt: Não estou me sentindo bem hoje.
translations.th: วันนี้ไม่ค่อยสบาย
translations.vi: Hôm nay tôi không khỏe.

lessons.sentence: Could you turn down the volume, please?

translations.de: Könnten Sie bitte die Lautstärke verringern?
translations.en: Could you turn down the volume, please?
translations.fr: Pourriez-vous baisser le volume, s'il vous plaît ?
translations.hi: क्या आप आवाज़ कम कर सकते हैं?
translations.it: Potrebbe abbassare il volume, per favore?
translations.ja: 音量を下げていただけますか？
translations.pt: Você poderia abaixar o volume, por favor?
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы убавить громкость?
translations.th: ช่วยลดเสียงหน่อยได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể vặn nhỏ âm lượng không?

lessons.sentence: I think I left my wallet at home.

translations.ar: أعتقد أنني تركت محفظتي في المنزل.
translations.de: Ich glaube, ich habe meine Brieftasche zu Hause gelassen.
translations.en: I think I left my wallet at home.
translations.es: Creo que dejé mi billetera en casa.
translations.fr: Je pense avoir laissé mon portefeuille à la maison.
translations.hi: लगता है बटुआ घर पर छूट गया।
translations.it: Penso di aver lasciato il portafoglio a casa.
translations.ja: 財布を家に忘れてきたようです。
translations.ko: 지갑을 집에 두고 온 것 같아요.
translations.pt: Acho que deixei minha carteira em casa.
translations.th: ผมคิดว่าลืมกระเป๋าสตางค์ไว้ที่บ้าน
translations.vi: Tôi nghĩ tôi để quên ví ở nhà.
translations.zh-CN: 我好像把钱包落在家里了。
translations.zh-TW: 我好像把錢包落在家裡了。

lessons.sentence: Would you mind opening the window?

translations.de: Würde es Ihnen etwas ausmachen, das Fenster zu öffnen?
translations.en: Would you mind opening the window?
translations.fr: Cela vous dérangerait-il d'ouvrir la fenêtre ?
translations.hi: क्या आप खिड़की खोल सकते हैं?
translations.ja: 窓を開けていただけますか？
translations.pt: Você se importaria de abrir a janela?
translations.th: ช่วยเปิดหน้าต่างได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có phiền mở cửa sổ không?

lessons.sentence: I've been meaning to call you.

translations.de: Ich wollte Sie schon lange anrufen.
translations.en: I've been meaning to call you.
translations.hi: मैं आपको फ़ोन करने वाला था।
translations.ja: お電話しようと思っていました。
translations.th: ฉันตั้งใจจะโทรหาคุณ
translations.vi: Tôi định gọi cho bạn.

lessons.sentence: Let me know if you need anything.

translations.de: Sagen Sie mir Bescheid, wenn Sie etwas brauchen.
translations.en: Let me know if you need anything.
translations.fr: Dites-moi si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit.
translations.it: Mi faccia sapere se ha bisogno di qualcosa.
translations.ja: 何か必要でしたらお知らせください。
translations.pt: Me avise se precisar de algo.
translations.ru: Дайте знать, если вам что-нибудь нужно.
translations.th: บอกฉันนะถ้าต้องการอะไร
translations.vi: Cho tôi biết nếu bạn cần gì.
translations.zh-CN: 如果需要什么就告诉我。
translations.zh-TW: 如果需要什麼就告訴我。

lessons.sentence: I was wondering if you could help me with something.

translations.ar: كنت أتساءل إذا كنت تستطيع مساعدتي في شيء.
translations.de: Ich habe mich gefragt, ob Sie mir bei etwas helfen könnten.
translations.en: I was wondering if you could help me with something.
translations.es: Me preguntaba si podrías ayudarme con algo.
translations.fr: Je me demandais si vous pourriez m'aider avec quelque chose.
translations.hi: क्या आप मेरी कुछ मदद कर सकते हैं?
translations.it: Mi chiedevo se potesse aiutarmi con qualcosa.
translations.ja: ちょっとお手伝いいただけないでしょうか。
translations.pt: Eu queria saber se você poderia me ajudar com algo.
translations.ru: Я хотел узнать, не могли бы вы мне помочь.
translations.th: ไม่ทราบว่าคุณช่วยฉันได้ไหม
translations.vi: Không biết bạn có thể giúp tôi một việc không?
translations.zh-CN: 不知道你能否帮我一个忙。
translations.zh-TW: 不知道你能否幫我一個忙。

lessons.sentence: We need to discuss this matter further.

translations.ar: نحتاج لمناقشة هذا الأمر بشكل أكبر.
translations.de: Wir müssen diese Angelegenheit weiter besprechen.
translations.en: We need to discuss this matter further.
translations.es: Necesitamos discutir este asunto más a fondo.
translations.fr: Nous devons discuter davantage de cette question.
translations.hi: हमें इस मामले पर और चर्चा करनी होगी।
translations.ja: この件についてさらに議論する必要があります。
translations.pt: Precisamos discutir este assunto mais detalhadamente.
translations.ru: Нам нужно обсудить этот вопрос подробнее.
translations.th: เราต้องหารือเรื่องนี้เพิ่มเติม
translations.vi: Chúng ta cần thảo luận thêm về vấn đề này.
translations.zh-CN: 我们需要进一步讨论这件事。
translations.zh-TW: 我們需要進一步討論這件事。

lessons.sentence: I'll prepare the report by tomorrow.

translations.de: Ich werde den Bericht bis morgen vorbereiten.
translations.en: I'll prepare the report by tomorrow.
translations.fr: Je préparerai le rapport d'ici demain.
translations.hi: मैं कल तक रिपोर्ट तैयार कर दूँगा।
translations.ja: 明日までにレポートを準備します。
translations.pt: Vou preparar o relatório até amanhã.
translations.ru: Я подготовлю отчёт к завтрашнему дню.
translations.th: ผมจะเตรียมรายงานให้ภายในพรุ่งนี้
translations.vi: Tôi sẽ chuẩn bị báo cáo vào ngày mai.
translations.zh-CN: 我会在明天之前准备好报告。
translations.zh-TW: 我會在明天之前準備好報告。

lessons.sentence: Could we reschedule the meeting?

translations.de: Könnten wir das Meeting verschieben?
translations.en: Could we reschedule the meeting?
translations.hi: क्या हम मीटिंग की तारीख बदल सकते हैं?
translations.ja: 会議の日程を変更できますか？
translations.th: เราเลื่อนการประชุมได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Chúng ta có thể đổi lịch họp không?
translations.zh-CN: 我们可以重新安排会议时间吗？
translations.zh-TW: 我們可以重新安排會議時間嗎？

lessons.sentence: I'd like to propose a new idea.

translations.de: Ich möchte eine neue Idee vorschlagen.
translations.en: I'd like to propose a new idea.
translations.es: Me gustaría proponer una nueva idea.
translations.fr: Je voudrais proposer une nouvelle idée.
translations.hi: मैं एक नया विचार प्रस्तुत करना चाहता हूँ।
translations.ja: 新しいアイデアを提案したいと思います。
translations.pt: Gostaria de propor uma nova ideia.
translations.ru: Я хотел бы предложить новую идею.
translations.th: ผมอยากเสนอไอเดียใหม่
translations.vi: Tôi muốn đề xuất một ý tưởng mới.

lessons.sentence: We're behind schedule on this project.

translations.ar: نحن متأخرون عن الجدول في هذا المشروع.
translations.de: Wir sind bei diesem Projekt im Verzug.
translations.en: We're behind schedule on this project.
translations.fr: Nous avons du retard sur ce projet.
translations.hi: इस प्रोजेक्ट में देरी हो रही है।
translations.it: Siamo in ritardo su questo progetto.
translations.ja: このプロジェクトは予定より遅れています。
translations.ru: Мы отстаём от графика по этому проекту.
translations.th: โปรเจกต์นี้ล่าช้ากว่ากำหนด
translations.vi: Dự án này đang bị chậm tiến độ.

lessons.sentence: I'll follow up with you next week.

translations.de: Ich melde mich nächste Woche bei Ihnen.
translations.en: I'll follow up with you next week.
translations.es: Le haré seguimiento la próxima semana.
translations.fr: Je vous recontacterai la semaine prochaine.
translations.ja: 来週またご連絡します。
translations.pt: Entrarei em contato na próxima semana.
translations.ru: Я свяжусь с вами на следующей неделе.
translations.th: ผมจะติดตามกับคุณสัปดาห์หน้า
translations.vi: Tôi sẽ liên hệ lại vào tuần tới.

lessons.sentence: Could you elaborate on that point?

translations.ar: هل يمكنك التوسع في هذه النقطة؟
translations.de: Könnten Sie diesen Punkt näher erläutern?
translations.en: Could you elaborate on that point?
translations.hi: क्या आप इस बिंदु पर विस्तार से बता सकते हैं?
translations.ja: その点についてもう少し詳しく説明していただけますか？
translations.pt: Você poderia elaborar mais sobre esse ponto?
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы подробнее остановиться на этом?
translations.th: ช่วยอธิบายประเด็นนั้นเพิ่มเติมได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể giải thích thêm về điểm đó không?

lessons.sentence: I completely agree with your suggestion.

translations.de: Ich stimme Ihrem Vorschlag voll und ganz zu.
translations.en: I completely agree with your suggestion.
translations.es: Estoy completamente de acuerdo con su sugerencia.
translations.fr: Je suis entièrement d'accord avec votre suggestion.
translations.hi: मैं आपके सुझाव से पूरी तरह सहमत हूँ।
translations.it: Sono completamente d'accordo con il suo suggerimento.
translations.ja: ご提案に完全に同意します。
translations.ru: Я полностью согласен с вашим предложением.
translations.th: ผมเห็นด้วยกับข้อเสนอของคุณอย่างยิ่ง
translations.vi: Tôi hoàn toàn đồng ý với đề xuất của bạn.

lessons.sentence: I'd like to book a room for two nights.

translations.de: Ich möchte ein Zimmer für zwei Nächte buchen.
translations.en: I'd like to book a room for two nights.
translations.es: Me gustaría reservar una habitación por dos noches.
translations.fr: Je voudrais réserver une chambre pour deux nuits.
translations.hi: मुझे दो रातों के लिए कमरा बुक करना है।
translations.it: Vorrei prenotare una camera per due notti.
translations.ja: 2泊で部屋を予約したいのですが。
translations.pt: Gostaria de reservar um quarto por duas noites.
translations.ru: Я хотел бы забронировать номер на две ночи.
translations.th: ผมอยากจองห้องสองคืน
translations.vi: Tôi muốn đặt phòng hai đêm.

lessons.sentence: What time does the train depart?

translations.de: Wann fährt der Zug ab?
translations.en: What time does the train depart?
translations.fr: À quelle heure part le train ?
translations.it: A che ora parte il treno?
translations.ja: 電車は何時に出発しますか？
translations.th: รถไฟออกกี่โมง?
translations.vi: Tàu khởi hành lúc mấy giờ?

lessons.sentence: Is breakfast included in the room rate?

translations.ar: هل الفطور مشمول في سعر الغرفة؟
translations.de: Ist das Frühstück im Zimmerpreis inbegriffen?
translations.en: Is breakfast included in the room rate?
translations.es: ¿El desayuno está incluido en la tarifa?
translations.fr: Le petit-déjeuner est-il inclus dans le tarif ?
translations.hi: क्या नाश्ता कमरे की कीमत में शामिल है?
translations.it: La colazione è inclusa nella tariffa?
translations.ja: 朝食は宿泊料金に含まれていますか？
translations.pt: O café da manhã está incluído na diária?
translations.th: อาหารเช้ารวมในค่าห้องไหม?
translations.vi: Bữa sáng có bao gồm trong giá phòng không?

lessons.sentence: Could you recommend a good restaurant nearby?

translations.ar: هل يمكنك أن توصي بمطعم جيد قريب؟
translations.de: Könnten Sie ein gutes Restaurant in der Nähe empfehlen?
translations.en: Could you recommend a good restaurant nearby?
translations.fr: Pourriez-vous recommander un bon restaurant à proximité ?
translations.hi: पास में कोई अच्छा रेस्तरां बताइए?
translations.it: Potrebbe consigliarmi un buon ristorante qui vicino?
translations.ja: 近くのおすすめのレストランを教えていただけますか？
translations.pt: Você poderia recomendar um bom restaurante por perto?
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы порекомендовать хороший ресторан поблизости?
translations.th: แนะนำร้านอาหารดีๆ ใกล้ๆ ได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể giới thiệu nhà hàng ngon gần đây không?
translations.zh-CN: 你能推荐附近的好餐厅吗？
translations.zh-TW: 你能推薦附近的好餐廳嗎？

lessons.sentence: I'd like to extend my stay by one more night.

translations.de: Ich möchte meinen Aufenthalt um eine Nacht verlängern.
translations.en: I'd like to extend my stay by one more night.
translations.es: Me gustaría extender mi estancia una noche más.
translations.fr: Je voudrais prolonger mon séjour d'une nuit supplémentaire.
translations.hi: मैं एक रात और रुकना चाहता हूँ।
translations.it: Vorrei prolungare il mio soggiorno di una notte.
translations.ja: もう一泊延長したいのですが。
translations.pt: Gostaria de estender minha estadia por mais uma noite.
translations.ru: Я хотел бы продлить проживание ещё на одну ночь.
translations.th: ผมอยากขยายการเข้าพักอีกหนึ่งคืน
translations.vi: Tôi muốn ở thêm một đêm nữa.

lessons.sentence: The flight has been delayed by two hours.

translations.de: Der Flug hat zwei Stunden Verspätung.
translations.en: The flight has been delayed by two hours.
translations.es: El vuelo se ha retrasado dos horas.
translations.fr: Le vol a été retardé de deux heures.
translations.hi: फ्लाइट दो घंटे देरी से है।
translations.it: Il volo è stato ritardato di due ore.
translations.ja: フライトが2時間遅れています。
translations.pt: O voo foi atrasado em duas horas.
translations.th: เที่ยวบินล่าช้าสองชั่วโมง
translations.vi: Chuyến bay bị trễ hai tiếng.

lessons.sentence: I'm allergic to peanuts.

translations.de: Ich bin allergisch gegen Erdnüsse.
translations.en: I'm allergic to peanuts.
translations.ja: ピーナッツアレルギーがあります。
translations.th: ผมแพ้ถั่วลิสง
translations.vi: Tôi bị dị ứng đậu phộng.

lessons.sentence: Could you take a photo of us, please?

translations.de: Könnten Sie bitte ein Foto von uns machen?
translations.en: Could you take a photo of us, please?
translations.fr: Pourriez-vous nous prendre en photo, s'il vous plaît ?
translations.hi: क्या आप हमारी फोटो खींच सकते हैं?
translations.it: Potrebbe farci una foto, per favore?
translations.ja: 写真を撮っていただけますか？
translations.pt: Você poderia tirar uma foto nossa, por favor?
translations.ru: Не могли бы вы сфотографировать нас?
translations.th: ช่วยถ่ายรูปให้เราได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có thể chụp ảnh giúp chúng tôi không?

lessons.sentence: Do you have this in a different color?

translations.de: Haben Sie das in einer anderen Farbe?
translations.en: Do you have this in a different color?
translations.fr: Avez-vous ceci dans une autre couleur ?
translations.hi: क्या यह दूसरे रंग में है?
translations.it: Ce l'avete in un altro colore?
translations.ja: 別の色はありますか？
translations.ru: У вас есть это в другом цвете?
translations.th: มีสีอื่นไหม?
translations.vi: Bạn có màu khác không?

lessons.sentence: Is there a discount for buying in bulk?

translations.de: Gibt es einen Rabatt beim Großeinkauf?
translations.en: Is there a discount for buying in bulk?
translations.es: ¿Hay descuento por comprar al por mayor?
translations.fr: Y a-t-il une réduction pour l'achat en gros ?
translations.hi: थोक में खरीदने पर छूट है?
translations.it: C'è uno sconto per l'acquisto all'ingrosso?
translations.ja: まとめ買いで割引はありますか？
translations.pt: Tem desconto para compra em quantidade?
translations.th: ซื้อเยอะมีส่วนลดไหม?
translations.vi: Mua số lượng lớn có giảm giá không?

lessons.sentence: Could I get a receipt, please?

translations.de: Könnte ich bitte eine Quittung bekommen?
translations.en: Could I get a receipt, please?
translations.fr: Puis-je avoir un reçu, s'il vous plaît ?
translations.it: Potrei avere la ricevuta, per favore?
translations.ja: レシートをいただけますか？
translations.pt: Poderia me dar o recibo, por favor?
translations.th: ขอใบเสร็จด้วยครับ/ค่ะ
translations.vi: Cho tôi xin hóa đơn.

lessons.sentence: I'm just looking, thank you.

translations.de: Ich schaue nur, danke.
translations.en: I'm just looking, thank you.
translations.ja: 見ているだけです、ありがとうございます。
translations.th: แค่ดูเฉยๆ ขอบคุณ
translations.vi: Tôi chỉ xem thôi, cảm ơn.

lessons.sentence: When does the sale end?

translations.de: Wann endet der Verkauf?
translations.en: When does the sale end?
translations.ja: セールはいつまでですか？
translations.th: ลดราคาถึงเมื่อไหร่?
translations.vi: Khuyến mãi kết thúc khi nào?

lessons.sentence: This product seems to be defective.

translations.de: Dieses Produkt scheint defekt zu sein.
translations.en: This product seems to be defective.
translations.hi: यह उत्पाद खराब लग रहा है।
translations.ja: この製品は不良品のようです。
translations.pt: Este produto parece estar com defeito.
translations.th: สินค้านี้ดูเหมือนมีตำหนิ
translations.vi: Sản phẩm này có vẻ bị lỗi.

lessons.sentence: It was lovely talking to you.

translations.de: Es war schön, mit Ihnen zu sprechen.
translations.en: It was lovely talking to you.
translations.fr: C'était un plaisir de discuter avec vous.
translations.it: È stato un piacere parlare con lei.
translations.ja: お話しできて楽しかったです。
translations.pt: Foi um prazer conversar com você.
translations.th: ดีใจที่ได้คุยกัน
translations.vi: Rất vui được nói chuyện với bạn.

lessons.sentence: I'm going to grab a coffee. Would you like one?

translations.de: Ich hole mir einen Kaffee. Möchten Sie auch einen?
translations.en: I'm going to grab a coffee. Would you like one?
translations.es: Voy a tomar un café. ¿Quieres uno?
translations.fr: Je vais prendre un café. En voulez-vous un ?
translations.hi: मैं कॉफ़ी लेने जा रहा हूँ। आपको चाहिए?
translations.it: Vado a prendere un caffè. Ne vuole uno?
translations.ja: コーヒーを買ってきます。いかがですか？
translations.pt: Vou pegar um café. Quer um?
translations.ru: Я пойду за кофе. Вам тоже принести?
translations.th: ฉันจะไปซื้อกาแฟ เอาด้วยไหม?
translations.vi: Tôi đi mua cà phê. Bạn có muốn một ly không?
translations.zh-CN: 我去买杯咖啡，要帮你带一杯吗？
translations.zh-TW: 我去買杯咖啡，要幫你帶一杯嗎？

lessons.sentence: Let's schedule a conference call for this afternoon.

translations.ar: لنحدد موعدا لمكالمة جماعية هذا المساء.
translations.de: Lassen Sie uns für heute Nachmittag eine Telefonkonferenz ansetzen.
translations.en: Let's schedule a conference call for this afternoon.
translations.es: Programemos una conferencia telefónica para esta tarde.
translations.fr: Planifions une conférence téléphonique cet après-midi.
translations.hi: आज दोपहर के लिए कॉन्फ्रेंस कॉल रखते हैं।
translations.it: Fissiamo una conferenza telefonica per questo pomeriggio.
translations.ja: 今日の午後に電話会議を設定しましょう。
translations.pt: Vamos agendar uma teleconferência para esta tarde.
translations.ru: Давайте назначим конференц-звонок на сегодня после обеда.
translations.th: มาจัดประชุมทางโทรศัพท์บ่ายนี้กัน
translations.vi: Hãy lên lịch họp qua điện thoại chiều nay.
translations.zh-CN: 我们安排今天下午开个电话会议吧。
translations.zh-TW: 我們安排今天下午開個電話會議吧。

lessons.sentence: Excuse me, is this the right platform for the downtown train?

translations.ar: عفوا، هل هذا الرصيف الصحيح لقطار وسط المدينة؟
translations.de: Entschuldigung, ist das der richtige Bahnsteig für den Zug in die Innenstadt?
translations.en: Excuse me, is this the right platform for the downtown train?
translations.es: Disculpe, ¿es este el andén correcto para el tren al centro?
translations.fr: Excusez-moi, est-ce le bon quai pour le train vers le centre-ville ?
translations.hi: सुनिए, क्या यह शहर जाने वाली ट्रेन का सही प्लेटफॉर्म है?
translations.it: Mi scusi, è questo il binario giusto per il treno verso il centro?
translations.ja: すみません、市内行きの電車はこのホームで合っていますか？
translations.ko: 실례합니다, 시내행 열차 플랫폼이 여기 맞나요?
translations.pt: Com licença, esta é a plataforma certa para o trem ao centro?
translations.ru: Извините, это правильная платформа для поезда в центр?
translations.th: ขอโทษครับ ชานชาลานี้ถูกไหมสำหรับรถไฟเข้าเมือง?
translations.vi: Xin lỗi, đây có phải sân ga đúng cho tàu vào trung tâm không?
translations.zh-CN: 请问，这是去市中心的列车站台吗？
translations.zh-TW: 請問，這是去市中心的列車月台嗎？

lessons.sentence: Can I get a gift receipt for this?

translations.ar: هل يمكنني الحصول على إيصال هدية؟
translations.de: Kann ich dafür einen Geschenkbeleg bekommen?
translations.en: Can I get a gift receipt for this?
translations.fr: Puis-je avoir un ticket cadeau pour ceci ?
translations.hi: क्या इसकी गिफ्ट रसीद मिल सकती है?
translations.ja: ギフト用のレシートをいただけますか？
translations.pt: Posso ter um recibo de presente?
translations.th: ขอใบเสร็จสำหรับของขวัญได้ไหม?
translations.vi: Cho tôi xin hóa đơn quà tặng được không?
translations.zh-CN: 能给我一张礼品收据吗？
translations.zh-TW: 能給我一張禮品收據嗎？
